column2: an A.M. Eatery////As I studied the menu
column3: I noted the ingredients in the OMG French Toast looked interesting enough to investigate further. We snagged an order of that
column4: and some breakfast tacos for the table (because Texas). About 20 minutes later
column5: I retracted every snide comment I'd made about waiting 45 minutes for a meal that
column6: "I could make myself". There is no way I could ever hope to make french toast that good. Not on my best day
column7: not in a million years. People. PEOPLE. This french toast will end wars. It will cure diseases. It will solve your problems. It's incredible. It was even incredible a day later
